Articles.Content:
I've been beating on this most of the day, and while I can get my code to move the point it's aimed at, I can't get it to point in the direction I want.  I once picked through Hullcam and other mods to gradually gather the info I needed but we are in brand new territory now.

Since v1.2 (and as a guess, because of the new ability to "Aim Camera" at parts with advanced tweakables turned on) the code that once did the trick now does not.

I need a hand here, something to study since the API is basically mute on the subject.

My source is here: https://github.com/TedThompson/Kerbal-Optical-Alignment-System

It pains me greatly to be so clueless about this - but I just can't find any damn info "out there"...
